description.full: Join the Band  - Enjoy a whole new genre of music focused on today’s hottest hits and classic anthems that everyone will know and love - Take the stage and rock out as Taylor Swift, No Doubt, and Adam Levine of Maroon 5 - Create your own band - play with any combination of instruments you want, even up to 4 lead singers - Join the party at any time with the click of a button in Party Play Mode - Enter Sing-Along Mode, where players can simply plug in one controller and up to three microphones and sing together, Karaoke style, on any song in the game - Explore your originality and create music with ease in the new and improved GH™Studio - Expand your music collection by Importing your Guitar Hero® World Tour and Guitar Hero® 5 Downloadable Content straight into Band Hero™. *Does not apply to a limited number of songs.
